resources: Tapping App When is on, it provides spoken feed-back so that you can use device without looking at the screen. This can helpful for people who have low vision. To navigate using - Drag either one or two fingers to scroll - Single-tap to select and hear an item - Double-tap to activate an item To perform long click using - Single-tap to select, again tap and hold To open notification tray using - Slowly move from top to down on the screen when using any app - Swipe down anywhere on screen when on home screen To close notification tray using - Swipe up anywhere to closeTo turn off - Tap the switch. You will see a outline. Then double-tap the switch. - On the confirmation message, tap OK. Then double-tap OK. >> version1.0.0 Common Common
